  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/3596</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/3596</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Galí: Aprenc els nombres</string>
            <string language="en">Galí: Learning numbers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Galí: Erlernenzahlen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Galí : Nombres d'étude</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Galí: Números de aprendizagem</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Galí: Numeri imparanti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Galν: Αριθμοί εκμάθησης</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Activitats interactives per practicar les xifres en català adreçades a l'alumnat nouvingut. Les activitats són d'iniciació i permeten identificar oralment i gràficament cada xifra.</string>
            <string language="en">Interactive activities aimed at pupils who have recently moved to Catalonia. Introduction to numbers enabling pupils to identify each digit, both orally and in writing.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">comprensió oral</string>
            <string language="en">listening comprehension</string>
            <string language="es">comprensión oral</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">expressió oral</string>
            <string language="en">oral expression</string>
            <string language="es">expresión oral</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">comprensió del text</string>
            <string language="en">text comprehension</string>
            <string language="es">comprensión del texto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">expressió escrita</string>
            <string language="en">written expression</string>
            <string language="es">expresión escrita</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Interaktive Aktivitäten strebten Schüler an, die
vor kurzem nach Katalonien umgezogen sind. Einleitung in eine 
Zahlen, Pupillen aktivierend, jedes Digit mündlich zu kennzeichnen, 
und im Schreiben.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les activités interactives ont visé les élèves
qui se sont récemment déplacés en Catalogne. Introduction aux
nombres permettant à des pupilles d'identifier chaque chiffre, 
oralement et dans l'écriture.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As atividades interativas visaram os alunos que se
têm movido recentemente para Catalonia. Introdução aos 
números permitindo as pupilas de identificar oral cada dígito,  e na
escrita.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le attività interattive hanno puntato sugli 
allievi che recentemente si sono mossi in Catalogna. 
Introduzione ai numeri permettendo alle pupille di identificare 
oralmente ogni cifra, sia che nella scrittura.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαλογικές δραστηριότητες που στοχεύουν στους μαθητές 
που έχουν κινηθεί πρόσφατα προς την Καταλωνία. Εισαγωγή 
στους αριθμούς που επιτρέπουν στους μαθητές για να προσδιορίσει 
κάθε ψηφίο, και προφορικά και γράφοντας εγγράφως.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">hörendes Erfassen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mundausdruck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Textverständnis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">schriftlicher Ausdruck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">compréhension d'écoute</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">expression orale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">compréhension des textes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">expression écrite</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">compreensão escutando</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">expressão oral</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">compreensão de texto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">expressão escrita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">comprensione ascoltante</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">espressione orale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">comprensione del testo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">espressione scritta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κατανόηση ακούσματος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">προφορική έκφραση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κατανόηση κειμένων</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γραπτή έκφραση</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
